title: Navy Yard shooting
author: VD
content_html:
“A Navy spokesman says four have been killed, eight wounded in shooting at the Washington Navy Yard. #BREAKING: 4 killed and 8 injured. One shooter down #NavyYardShooting #Navy #CNICHQ”

“We urge citizens to listen to the authorities and follow directions….”
–  unnamed White House official

Well, that’s certainly a creepy response.

UPDATE: “officials said six people were killed and as many as 10 were wounded, including a law enforcement officer.”

UPDATE 2: “THIRTEEN DEAD IN NAVY YARD SHOOTING”.  Dead includes Aaron Alexis, the shooter.
content_text:
“
A Navy spokesman
says four have been killed, eight wounded in shooting at the Washington Navy Yard. #BREAKING:  4 killed and 8 injured.  One shooter down #NavyYardShooting #Navy #CNICHQ”
“We urge citizens to listen to the authorities and follow directions….”
–  unnamed White House official
Well, that’s certainly a creepy response.
UPDATE: “officials said six people were killed and as many as 10 were wounded, including a law enforcement officer.”
UPDATE 2: “THIRTEEN DEAD IN NAVY YARD SHOOTING”.
Dead includes Aaron Alexis
, the shooter.
